sentences.en: Additional InterContinental, Westin and Ritz - Carlton hotels are to open in the area this year.
sentences.cn: 洲际酒店 、 威斯汀酒店和丽思-卡尔顿酒店今年也将在此开设新店.

sentences.en: Cheap, intercontinental rail tickets are also available for European travel.
sentences.cn: 去欧洲旅行可以买到便宜的洲际火车票.

sentences.en: Hello. I am calling from intercontinental airlines. Is this Mr. Lin?
sentences.cn: 喂! 我是大陆航空公司, 您是林先生 吗 ?

sentences.en: Intercontinental airlines may i help you?
sentences.cn: 大陆航空公司,我能为您服务 吗 ?

sentences.en: Intercontinental travel shall be defined as travel from one continent to another.
sentences.cn: 跨洲旅行应被视为大洲间的旅行.

sentences.en: Its staging there has thus been hailed with intercontinental gongs and whistles.
sentences.cn: 现在该剧就在那里演出,因而受到洲际的锣声、哨声的喝彩.

sentences.en: Many early launch vehicle s were derived from intercontinental Ballistic missiles.
sentences.cn: 早期的运载火箭有许多原来是为洲际弹道飞弹而研制的.

sentences.en: North Korea has threatened to test-fire an intercontinental ballistic missile .
sentences.cn: 朝鲜已威胁要试射一枚洲际弹道导弹。

sentences.en: The intercontinental missiles have extremely strong antipersonnel power.
sentences.cn: 洲际导弹的杀伤性极强.

sentences.en: The Russians first fielded an intercontinental ballistic missile.
sentences.cn: 俄国人首先发射了洲际弹道导弹.

sentences.en: The same stage, there is inter - generational cross - border inter - Korean intercontinental people to note Pan Jinlian.
sentences.cn: 同一舞台上, 有跨朝 跨 代跨国 跨 洲的人来评说潘金莲.

sentences.en: These are not class of submarines that can launch intercontinental nuclear missiles.
sentences.cn: 他们不是能够发射洲际弹道核导弹的潜艇.

sentences.en: They are classified as intercontinental, long - range, medium - range and short - range missiles.
sentences.cn: 它们分别为洲际导弹 、 远程导弹 、 中程导弹、 近程 导弹.

sentences.en: This allows the reader to differentiate between theaterand intercontinental assets with ease.
sentences.cn: 这样可以让读者方便地区分战区导弹与洲际导弹.

sentences.en: Warm greetings from the InterContinental Ambassador Service Center!
sentences.cn: 从服务中心洲际大使表示热烈的祝贺!
